name: auto-using
description: Provides intellisense for and imports references from all available sources.
author: Fudge

autousing.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile && cd server/AutoUsing && dotnet publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.compile-everything: tsc -b && cd server/AutoUsing && dotnet build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.compile-everything-test: tsc -b && cd server/AutoUsing && dotnet build && cd .. && cd .. && dotnet restore client/src/test/playground
